opportunity.description: 3 Muskateers has a number of scenes with elaborate stage combat sequences which are central to plot evolution and the majority of these stage combat sequences revolve around action with sword fights. In order to do justice to this oft-performed and critically acclaimed work by Alexandre Dumas, the stage combat cannot be executed without a seasoned Fight Master to plan the fight choreography, safely train our performers, and oversee the fight choreography from rehearsals to opening night
